Html: Hi, I have performed step 3 of your tutorial to implement Ribbon to a Windows Forms application (http://blogs.microsoft.co.il/blogs/arik/archive/2009/09/15/windows-ribbon-for-winforms-part-3-first-winforms-ribbon-application.aspx), and when I get everything right hard but Nombe the first tab that is displayed is the "Label: InternalCmd4" but I would like to change the name for another, for example "Home".

Check out part 6 of this blog series.

The table of contents is here: http://blogs.microsoft.co.il/blogs/arik/archive/2009/12/23/windows-ribbon-for-winforms-part-0-table-of-contents.aspx

If you havn't already done so, I suggest reading it in order.
